markdownRemark.html:
No, I haven’t moved physically. Rather, I’ve moved my blog. My first blog, coffee. code. cedric, was hosted on Medium when that was the cool thing to do. I even had a custom domain for my publication before that feature was steamrolled.

  • issues with previous blog

    • too technically focused

To be honest, I really struggled keeping up with the blog. It felt like every new post I would start off by saying, “I know this is long overdue, but from now on, I’m going to start writing a post every x amount of time” which turned out to never be true.

  • Why the move
